item.title: Industrial Ecology
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bk5vwFbGEP4 Uploaded on Jul 29, 2009 In this video students and teachers of the Leiden-Delft Industrial Ecology MSc programme explain what Industrial Ecology is, why it is important for sustainable development, and how the MSc programme gives them the tools to implement Industrial Ecology. http://www.industrialecology.nl
